summary: Adds a new and improved leveling syestem with new weapons and harder and higher levels
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds many new types of weapons and armor. The current weapons are just spears and a new shelid, I put some of it in the levleing system but you can still craft some of these weapons and upgrade them.
List
-daedric spear
-glass spear
-ebony spear
-elven spear
-dwarven spear
-orcish spear
-iron spear
-forsworn spear
-falmer spear
-draugr spear
-bound spear( bought at dragonsreach)
-bound Spear of etheral( bought at dragonsreach)
-orcish shield Rammer, far bash range
-granite hammer, not craftable or in leveling system yet
-The Mauler
-gem set
-dual swords
-The Infinity Blade

Ideas from Infininty Blade(upcoming)
-halfstar


Upcoming
-portalble ballista
-useable capapolt
-ramms
-new shelids
-half star( from Ininty Blade 2)
-new swords
-bound greatsword
-bound shelid
-more anminations
-gem set
-falmer set, greatswords,maces,battleaxes
-halbreds
-javelins
-pikes
-dual greatswords
-dual pikes
-dual daggers
-lengendnary weapons
-shadowrend
-soul hammer
-etheral set
-etheral armor
-new spears
-deathlord armor
-overlord armor
-tower shield
-Claw gloves
-mammothbone weap and armor set

News,MODDERS NEEDED
I need more modders but ones that can make good vertices in nifskope, I am hopeing that we can copy down morrowind vertices data and oblvion and put it into skyrim but i need many modders for that so plz message me.

Bugs
-dwarven and spear of etheral can crash your game so it was taken out of leveling system.
author: darealslenderman and bloodshed
